q.prior = null;

//æ’å…¥å¼€å§‹

0. æ‰“å°é“¾è¡¨

å°±æ˜¯ç®€å•æŠŠé“¾è¡¨çš„å…ƒç´ é€ä¸ªæ‰“å°åˆ°å±å¹•ä¸Šï¼ˆæ–¹ä¾¿åé¢æµ‹è¯•ï¼‰

public static void printLinkedList(LNode head){//å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ä¸å­˜æ•°æ®
		
		if(head == null){
			System.err.println("Wrong input;");
			return;
		}
		
		LNode p = head.next;
		System.out.print("[");
		while(p != null){
			if(p.next == null){
				System.out.println(p.value + "]");
				break;
			}else{
				System.out.print(p.value+",");
			}
			
			p = p.next;
		}
		
	}

1. å¤´æ’æ³•å»ºç«‹é“¾è¡¨

public static LNode createLinkedListHead(){
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		
		LNode head = new LNode();
		LNode p = head;
		while(sc.hasNextInt()){
			int data = sc.nextInt();
			LNode q = new LNode();
			q.value = data;
			q.next = p.next;
			p.next = q;
		}
		
		return head;
	}

æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

public static void main(String[] args){ 
		
		LNode l = createLinkedListHead();
		
		printLinkedList(l);
	}

public static LNode createLinkedListTail(){
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		
		LNode head = new LNode();
		LNode p = head;
		while(sc.hasNextInt()){
			int data = sc.nextInt();
			LNode q = new LNode();
			q.value = data;
			q.next = null;
			p.next = q;
			p = p.next;
		}
		
		return head;
	}

3. å‘é“¾è¡¨æŸä½ç½®æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ 

åœ¨é“¾è¡¨lçš„ç¬¬indexä¸ªä½ç½®æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ xï¼Œå³è‹¥æ’å…¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œé“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬indexä½ç½®å°±æ˜¯å…ƒç´ xã€‚

	public static void insertElement(LNode head, int index, int data){
		if(head == null || index <= 0){
			System.err.println("Wrong input");
			return;
		}
		
		int pos = 0;
		
		LNode p = head;//pç”¨æ¥å¯»æ‰¾è¦æ’å…¥ä½ç½®çš„å‰é©±ç»“ç‚¹
		
		while(pos < index-1){
			p = p.next;
			pos++;
			
			if(p == null){
				System.err.println("Insertion failed, index is too large, it should be less than " + (pos+1));
				return;
				
			}
		}
		
		LNode q = new LNode();
		q.value = data;
		q.next = null;
		q.next = p.next;
		p.next = q;	
	}

	public static void main(String[] args){ 
		
		LNode l = createLinkedListTail();
		
		System.out.print("æ’å…¥å‰ï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
		
		insertElement(l, 3, 8);
		
		System.out.print("æ’å…¥åï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
	}

/**
	 * åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨headä¸­çš„ç¬¬indexä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
	 * @param head
	 * @param index
	 */
	public static void deleteElement(LNode head, int index){
		if(head == null || index <= 0){
			System.err.println("Wrong input.");
			return;
		}
		
		LNode p = head;//pç”¨æ¥å¯»æ‰¾è¦åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰é©±
		int pos = 0;
		
		while(pos < index-1){
			System.out.println(pos);

			p = p.next;
			pos++;
			
			if(p.next == null){
				System.err.println("Deletion failed, index is too large, it should be less than " + (pos+1));
				return;
				
			}
			

		}
		
		
		int x = p.next.value;
		System.out.println("åˆ é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼ä¸ºï¼š" + x);
		p.next = p.next.next;
	}

	public static void main(String[] args){ 
		
		LNode l = createLinkedListTail();
		
		System.out.print("åˆ é™¤å‰ï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
		
		deleteElement(l, 2);
		
		System.out.print("åˆ é™¤åï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
	}

/**
	 * æŸ¥æ‰¾é“¾è¡¨headä¸­å…ƒç´ xç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºç°çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œå³ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªxæ˜¯headçš„ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
	 * @param head
	 * @param x
	 */
	public static void searchElement(LNode head, int x){
		if(head == null){
			System.err.println("Wrong input");
			return;
		}
		
		LNode p = head.next;
		int pos = 1;
		while(p != null){
			if(p.value == x){
				System.out.println("The first place which " + x + " shows in is " + pos);
				return;
			}else{
				p = p.next;
				pos++;
			}
		}
		
		if(p == null){
			System.out.println("There is no " + x + "in the list.");
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args){ 
		
		LNode l = createLinkedListTail();
		
		System.out.print("æ“ä½œå‰ï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
		
		searchElement(l, 5);
	}

6. åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å€¼ä¸ºkeyçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹

  1. é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´ æœªæ’åºæ—¶
  • æœ€ç®€å•çš„æ€è·¯ï¼šå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹pï¼Œéå†å…¶åçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œé‡åˆ°ä¸å…¶å€¼ç›¸åŒçš„ç»Ÿè®¡å¹¶åˆ é™¤ï¼Œè‹¥ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°å¤§äº0ï¼Œåˆ™åŒæ—¶åˆ é™¤å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹pã€‚

	/**
	 * åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­é‡å¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸ä¿ç•™ä»»ä½•é‡å¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
	 * @param head
	 */
	public static void deleteRepeated2_1(LNode head){
		if(head == null){
			System.err.println("Wrong input.");
			return;
		}
		LNode prior = head;
		LNode p = head.next;
		
		
		while(p != null){
			
			int times = 0;
			LNode qprior = p;
			LNode q = p.next;
			
			
			//åˆ é™¤æ‰€æœ‰ä¸på€¼ç›¸åŒçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
			while(q != null){
				if(q.value == p.value){
					times++;
					qprior.next = q.next;
					
				}else{
					qprior = qprior.next;
				}
				
				q = q.next;
			}
			
			//è‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨ä¸på€¼ç›¸åŒçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
			if(times == 0){
				prior = prior.next;
			}else{
				prior.next = p.next;	
			}
			p = p.next;
		}
	}

	public static void main(String[] args){ 
		
		LNode l = createLinkedListTail();
		
		System.out.print("æ“ä½œå‰ï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
		
		deleteRepeated2_1(l);
		
		System.out.print("æ“ä½œåï¼š");
		printLinkedList(l);
		
	}

æ“ä½œå‰ï¼š[2,1,2,3,1,4,5,2,3,6] æ“ä½œåï¼š[4,5,6]

  • å…ˆéå†ä¸€éé“¾è¡¨ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ç»Ÿè®¡æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç„¶åå†éå†ä¸€éï¼Œåˆ é™¤é‚£äº›å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°è¶…è¿‡1çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š$O(n)$ , ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š $O(n)$

	/**
	 * åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨ä¸­é‡å¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸ä¿ç•™ä»»ä½•é‡å¤èŠ‚ç‚¹
	 * æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼š O(n), ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ ï¼š O(n)
	 * @param head
	 */
	public static void deleteRepeated2_2(LNode head){
		if(head == null){
			System.err.println("Wrong input.");
			return;
		}
		
		LNode p = head.next;
		Map<Integer, Integer> ht = new HashMap<Integer, Integer>();
		while(p != null){
			int value = p.value;
			if(ht.containsKey(value)){
				ht.put(value, ht.get(value)+1);
			}else{
				ht.put(value, 1);
			}
			p = p.next;
		}	
		LNode prior = head;
		p = head.next;		
		while(p != null){
			if(ht.get(p.value) > 1){
				prior.next = p.next;
			}else{
				prior = prior.next;
			}
			
			p = p.next;
		}	
	}
